meanings.sent1: In biotics class, we learn about animals and plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use biotics to understand how living things work.
meanings.sent3: The biotics textbook made learning about nature fun.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the world of biotics is like unraveling a mystery.
meanings.sent5: Studying biotics helps us appreciate the wonders of life.

meanings.definition: A substance that promotes the growth of microorganisms in the body.
meanings.sent1: Probiotics are helpful biotics that support gut health.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes recommend biotics to aid digestion.
meanings.sent3: The yogurt was full of biotics that made the bacteria happy.
meanings.sent4: Taking biotics is like giving a boost to the body's tiny helpers.
meanings.sent5: Adding biotics to your diet can improve your overall well-being.

meanings.definition: A system of living organisms interacting with each other and their environment.
meanings.sent1: The rainforest is a complex biotics where plants and animals coexist.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the biotics of a pond involves observing frogs and insects.
meanings.sent3: The biotics of the park were disrupted when the new road was built.
meanings.sent4: The delicate balance of biotics in the ocean is crucial for marine life.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the biotics of a forest reveals the interconnectedness of nature.
